attributes.review: This is not ok my little sweet pumpkin saw this app and immediately started crying and saying I want my president back I am greatly disappointed that this exists I will contact my lawyer because I lost my fridge microwave kitchen table and basement from downloading this app I will need to speak with your manager right now

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR!!!!
attributes.review: RIGHT when u downloaded the app and kept it for approximately 10-15 minutes my phones had gotten more than 2 viruses and glitches every couple of minutes now do what you will with this app but also some of my information has been stolen.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!
attributes.review: I used this app and the guy on there was awful! He was mean and saying derogatory things and calling people names!! I found out his name was Donald Jenius Trump so I tried to call him to explain to him why his behavior was so bad. He sent me right to voicemail!! I hope he fixes his attitude and customer service soon!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updated on the daily news. Once I open the app, it crashed and it kept crashing. After than my phone got on fire and I had to buy a new phone. Once I bought the new phone I tried to download the app again and my phone caught on FIRE AGAIN. MR. TRUMP, YOUR APP IS TERRIBLE. 😼

attributes.title: Barf???
attributes.review: This app made me vomit? Story time. I was trying to support our great president when I got an ad for this nasty product (I won’t name names to spare y’all), and I literally threw up on my phone. I had to get a new phone because the vomit got in the charging port and fried the wires. If I could give it lower, I would :/

attributes.title: ✨t r a s h✨
attributes.review: my phone worked perfectly before downloading. now all of the sudden, my phone has been glitching!!11!!!!1!1! the first time i used it my wallpaper changed to a cheeto!!??!?1!!1!1?!1!!1? and when i changed it back i heard VOICES😰😰😰😰🖐🏻🖐🏻🖐🏻!! this app is LISTENING to me and i don’t recommend, very bad and now i get nightmares😖😖.

attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: My phone was normal and when I got this app it started glitching and then it sent me weird pictures of guys that were very inappropriate saying that it was one of trumps secretary’s.... my mom saw it and said that I was a disgrace and she took my eye out and fed it to the next door neighbors pet bear... that hurt😔✌️🤍

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: i downloaded this to keep up with out amazing president (note the sarcasm) but turns out that when you download it, it causes nonstop vomiting!!🤮 i think i need a whole new phone now too bc this app done messed it up😭 i don’t recommend this app. this app is for bald white men that drink their life away. DO NOT GET!💋✌🏻

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app in THE WORLD. it’s super slow never has any correct information just terrible. they’re always spreading false information and not to mention they hack into your phone. 😡😡🤬 ever since i downloaded it my phone has been way slower smh 🤬🤬

attributes.title: Not what I expected....
attributes.review:
All that I found in this app was propaganda. There’s not even any games to play. The app is very political and highlights extremist views away from the actual Republican Party. Also, why would I donate to a rich man who won’t show his tax returns. 
Too much reality tv show not enough actual material.
